UNDEFINED_ACRONYM: Expand to full term with abbreviation in parentheses on first use (e.g., 'User Requirement Specification (URS)').
MULTIPLE_SPACES: Remove extra spaces. Use single space between words.
MISSING_TOC: Add Table of Contents section at document beginning.
TOC_MISSING_SECTIONS: Add missing sections to Table of Contents.
HEADING_ORDER_MISMATCH: Reorder sections to match template structure.
EMPTY_CELLS: Populate empty cells or mark as 'N/A - [justification]'.
NA_WITHOUT_JUSTIFICATION: Add justification after N/A (minimum 5 words explaining why not applicable).
TBD_PLACEHOLDER: Replace with final content or 'N/A - [justification]' if not applicable.
AUTHOR_AS_REVIEWER: Assign different person as reviewer to maintain objectivity.
AMBIGUOUS_LANGUAGE: Replace with definitive language (use 'must' or 'shall' instead of 'should' or 'might').
DATA_INTEGRITY_ALCOA: Ensure action is attributable with signature and date.
VERSION_MISMATCH: Update version number to match across header/footer and revision history.
UNRESOLVED_COMMENT: Resolve or remove comment before finalizing document.
TOC_CONTENT_MISMATCH: Refresh Table of Contents to reflect current document structure.
UNUSED_ACRONYM: Remove from Acronyms section if not used in document.
MISSING_CONTEXT: Include details on the processes, tools, or audits that will ensure ongoing compliance or specified requirements.
AMBIGUOUS_REQUIREMENT: Specify clear, measurable criteria (e.g., downtime limits, data integrity checks, or thresholds) to avoid misinterpretation.
